examples.goal: source all .sh files in folder and subdirs
examples.command:
find ~/bashrc_addons/ -type f -name '*.sh' -exec sh -c '
 for file do
  echo "$file"
 done
' source {} +

examples.goal: find files with 777 perm and chmod to 644
find .rst files that were modified more than 1 and less than 3 days ago
